channel.title: Creating my own items (looks) and other problem
channel.description:
I've posted this many times..I just want a tutorial :)
Can I make my own items, or at least change the way an item looks. Not the color, the entire tihng liek shape etc.
Also, when I DL servers, and try to edit the server, it opens in notepad, and is just a bunch of weird symbols. I tried opening in it in a few other programs, none of it works though.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2007, 04:02:53 PM[/size][hr]13 views 0 replies. o fun
